_FC_DsLSDynaIOInfo Struct Reference
[(Private LS-Dyna IO)]

#include <lsdynaioP.h>

Collaboration diagram for _FC_DsLSDynaIOInfo:

[legend]

Detailed Description

Struct hold info about the file format for dataset.

Description:

Need to keep word size and endian-ness.

It would be more aesthetically pleasing to put the vertIDs in each mesh, but if put here, it is easier to manage cleaning up the dynamic memory. Ditto for conns_chunks

Modifications:

  • 7/17/2005 WSD Created.

Definition at line 68 of file lsdynaioP.h.
